title: Sci Tech & Regulation
description: Examines historical, legal, economic, and political rationales for regulation.  Survey of administrative law and processes, risk analysis/management, expertise and public, and current topical issues.   Credit not allowed for both PUBP 4440 and PUBP 6440.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: POL 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or INTA 1200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
